articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: How Joe Biden was Donald Trump's kryptonite
articles.description: President Donald Trump seemed to be a teflon president. It didn't matter how big things seem to get  -- Trump's political career seemed to be impermeable. That was until Trump ran into President-elect Joe Biden.

articles.title: Harris to be sworn in as vice president by Justice Sonia Sotomayor
articles.description: Kamala Harris will be sworn in Wednesday as the next vice president of the United States by Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor, according to a Harris aide.

articles.title: A Spanish mountain climber has died after falling from K2

articles.description: Fox News Channel's ratings have sagged since Election Day as CNN's ratings surge to historic levels.
